overview: Tawdry Audrey' is trying to get back to her old hometown...the one she left 5 year ago under the cloud of scandal. It seems she just can't keep her hands off of men...no matter who they are or who they are with. It's not that she's an evil girl, it's just that when she's around men sparks fly...and when sparks fly... Things Burn!
title: Why Things Burn
